articles.author: Noah Sheidlower
articles.title: Skipping college and switching jobs: What older Americans regret about their careers - Business Insider
articles.description: Many older Americans regret some of their career choices, such as not prioritizing education, frequent job changes, and involvement in workplace drama.
articles.content:
For millions of Americans, retiring at 65 is just a dream.
Since September, BI has heard from older Americans about their career regrets in two surveys it conducted.
Over 3,000 people between the a… [+10465 chars]
